001package edu.pdx.cs410J.apptbook;
002
003import edu.pdx.cs410J.AppointmentBookParser;
004import edu.pdx.cs410J.ParserException;
005
006import java.io.BufferedReader;
007import java.io.FileReader;
008import java.io.IOException;
009import java.io.Reader;
010
011public class TextParser implements AppointmentBookParser<AppointmentBook> {
012  private final Reader reader;
013
014  public TextParser(Reader reader) {
015    this.reader = reader;
016  }
017
018  @Override
019  public AppointmentBook parse() throws ParserException {
020    try (
021      BufferedReader br = new BufferedReader(this.reader)
022    ) {
023
024      String owner = br.readLine();
025
026      if (owner == null) {
027        throw new ParserException("Missing owner");
028      }
029
030      return new AppointmentBook(owner);
031
032    } catch (IOException e) {
033      throw new ParserException("While parsing appointment book text", e);
034    }
035  }
036}
